name: .BMFC File Extension
summary: Learn about .BMFC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: BMFC files are meant to be opened in AngelCode Bitmap Font Generator (Windows). To open a BMFC file in BFG, select Options â†’ Load configuration. Then, navigate to and open your BMFC file.
You can also open a BMFC file in Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or any other text editor, to view the font configuration it contains.
